nodes.text: The Haserians were a sentient species, native to the Haseria system in the Mid Rim. In 19 BBY, a group of young Coruscanti Haserians played a game of shockball against a group of similar aged Rodians. The game attracted a large crowd, which included Jax Pavan, Dejah Duare and I-5YQ.

The Haserians were created by Michael Reaves and were mentioned in passing in his novel Coruscant Nights II: Street of Shadows, published by Del Rey in 2008. They were given a home star system in 2009's The Essential Atlas.
